name: Space Frontier (itch) (Ben Yazi, pixelsohei)
description:
Preferably windows build. The best experience.  Synopsis

ISS Frontier - International Space Station Frontier.

Captain! Your main mission is to restore the station.

We all need to restore peace in the galaxy and ISS Frontier will become the home for the signing of a peace treaty.

In order for the peace between the four races to be signed, we must maintain a good reputation with everyone and completely repair the station.

Controls 

 Mouse - click click 

 P - pause 

 M - mute music

GameplayWe have a deal

With the right mouse button, you can send ships to the docks to unload goods. The goods will be exchanged 1-to-1 for money. If you do not have enough money - a decrease in reputation with this faction.

Each faction is responsible for its own type of goods.

Go to exit, dude

You can also right-click to send ships back to the portal. This also lowers your reputation, but may save other faction's ships from being destroyed.

Reborn

Resources need to be spent on restoring the station. You have 8 blocks that need to be restored:

- 6 docks (2 are already working). Docks vary in size. Larger ones are capable of taking on larger ships and also serve smaller ships faster.

- Radio tower

- 2 guns. Cannons are needed to protect against asteroids.

- The main block of the station. The most expensive repair

 Shit's happend

Sometimes ships with events appear from portals. Each event requires resources, but it greatly increases reputation for completion.

Credits

Code: Sergey Klabukov
Music: Pavel Pichugin
